ApplicationName.Description: The name of your Amazon Kinesis Analytics application.

ApplicationDescription.Description: The summary description of the application.

ApplicationCode.Description: One or more SQL statements that read input data, transform it, and generate                                 output.

Inputs.Description: Use this parameter to configure the application input.

ApplicationName.Description: The                                 name                                 of the application to which you want to add the output configuration.

Output.Description: An array of objects, each describing one output configuration.

ApplicationName.Description: The name of an existing application.

ReferenceDataSource.Description: The reference data source, which is an object in your                                 Amazon Simple Storage Service                                 (Amazon S3) bucket.

NamePrefix.Description: The                                 name                                 prefix to use when creating the in-application streams.

InputParallelism.Description: Describes the number of in-application streams to create.

InputSchema.Description: Describes the format of the data in the streaming source, and how each data element                                 maps to corresponding columns in the in-application stream that is being created.

KinesisFirehoseInput.Description: If the streaming source is an                                 Amazon Kinesis Firehose                                 delivery stream, identifies the                                 Kinesis Firehose                                 delivery stream's                                 Amazon Resource                                 Name                                 (ARN)                                 and an                                 IAM                                 role that enables                                 Kinesis Analytics                                 to access the stream on your behalf.

KinesisStreamsInput.Description: If the streaming source is an                                 Amazon Kinesis                                 stream, identifies the stream's                                 ARN                                 and an                                 IAM                                 role that enables                                 Kinesis Analytics                                 to access the stream on your behalf.

Count.Description: The number of in-application streams to create.

RecordEncoding.Description: Specifies the encoding of the records in the streaming source;                                 for                                 example, UTF-8.

RecordFormat.Description: Specifies the format of the records on the streaming source.

Mapping.Description: Reference to the data element in the streaming input of the reference data source.

Name.Description: The                                 name                                 of the column created in the in-application input stream or reference table.

SqlType.Description: The                                 type                                 of column created in the in-application input stream or reference table.

MappingParameters.Description: When configuring application input at the time of creating or updating an                                 application, provides additional mapping information specific to the record format                                 (such                                 as JSON, CSV, or record fields delimited by some delimiter) on the streaming source.

RecordFormatType.Description: The type of record format (e.g CSV or JSON.)

CSVMappingParameters.Description: Provides additional mapping information when the record format uses delimiters (for                                 example, CSV).

JSONMappingParameters.Description: Provides additional mapping information when JSON is the record format on the streaming                                 source.

RecordColumnDelimiter.Description: The                                 column                                 delimiter. For example, in a CSV format, a comma (",") is the typical column delimiter.

RecordRowDelimiter.Description: The                                 row                                 delimiter. For example, in a CSV format,                                 "\n"                                 is the typical row delimiter.

RecordRowPath.Description: The                                 path                                 to the top-level parent that contains the records (e.g.,                                 "$".)

ResourceARN.Description: The                                 Amazon Resource Name                                 (ARN)                                 of the input                                 Kinesis Firehose                                 delivery stream.

RoleARN.Description: The                                 ARN of the                                 IAM                                 role that                                 Kinesis Analytics                                 can assume to access the stream on your behalf.

ResourceARN.Description: The                                 Amazon Resource Name                                 (ARN)                                 of the input                                 Amazon Kinesis                                 stream to read.

RoleARN.Description: The                                 ARN of the IAM role that                                 Kinesis Analytics                                 can assume to access the stream on your behalf.

DestinationSchema.Description: The data format when records are written to the destination.

KinesisFirehoseOutput.Description: Identifies an                                 Amazon Kinesis Firehose                                 delivery stream as the destination.

KinesisStreamsOutput.Description: Identifies an                                 Amazon Kinesis                                 stream as the destination.

Name.Description: The name of the in-application stream.

RecordFormatType.Description: Specifies the format of the records on the output stream.

ResourceARN.Description: The                                 Amazon Resource                                 Name                                 (ARN)                                 of the destination Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery stream to write to.

RoleARN.Description: The ARN of the IAM role that Amazon Kinesis Analytics can assume to write to the destination                                 stream on your behalf.

ResourceARN.Description: The                                 Amazon Resource                                 Name                                 (ARN)                                 of the destination Amazon Kinesis stream to write to.

RoleARN.Description: The ARN of the IAM role that Amazon Kinesis Analytics can assume to write to the destination                                 stream on your behalf.

TableName.Description: The                                 name                                 of the in-application table to create.

S3ReferenceDataSource.Description: Identifies the                                 Amazon S3                                 bucket and object that contains the reference data. Also identifies the                                 IAM                                 role that                                 Amazon Kinesis Analytics                                 can assume to read this object on your behalf.

ReferenceSchema.Description: Describes the format of the data in the streaming source, and how each data                                 element maps to corresponding columns                                 that are                                 created in the in-application stream.

BucketARN.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the                                 Amazon S3                                 bucket.

FileKey.Description: The object key name containing reference data.

ReferenceRoleARN.Description: The ARN of the                                 IAM                                 role that the service can assume to read data on your behalf.

RecordColumns.Description: A list of Amazon Kinesis Analytics ApplicationReferenceDataSource RecordColumn objects.

RecordEncoding.Description: Specifies the encoding of the records in the streaming source; For example,                                 UTF-8.

RecordFormat.Description: Specifies the format of the records on the streaming source.

Mapping.Description: The reference to the data element in the streaming input of the reference data source.

Name.Description: The name of the column created in the in-application input stream or reference table.

SqlType.Description: The SQL                                 data type of                                 the column created in the in-application input stream or reference table.

MappingParameters.Description: When configuring application input at the time of creating or updating an application,                                 provides additional mapping information specific to the record format (such as JSON,                                 CSV, or record fields delimited by some delimiter) on the streaming source.

RecordFormatType.Description: The type of record format (CSV or JSON).

CSVMappingParameters.Description: Provides additional mapping information when the record format uses delimiters (for                                 example, CSV).

JSONMappingParameters.Description: Provides additional mapping information when JSON is the record format on the streaming                                 source.

RecordColumnDelimiter.Description: The column delimiter. For example, in a CSV format, a comma (",") is the typical column                                 delimiter.

RecordRowDelimiter.Description: The row delimiter. For example, in a CSV format,                                 "\n"                                 is the typical row delimiter.

RecordRowPath.Description: Path to the top-level parent that contains the records                                 (e.g.,                                 "$".)
